# The insertion of 5 iron ore into the furnace was successful, and the furnace is now in a working state, actively smelting the iron ore into iron plates.
# 
# My inventory has been updated to reflect that I now have 5 iron ore left.
# 
# As the furnace continues to work, I will wait for it to finish smelting the iron ore into plates. I will monitor the furnace to check when it has produced iron plates.

# Waiting for the smelting process to complete, with a maximum wait time of 30 seconds.
for _ in range(30):
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 5:  # Checking if 5 iron plates have been produced.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")  # Raise an exception if smelting takes too long.
